Text: Re Hiyou very much Vince I do it right now You will be receiving a recommendation form shortly Many thanks again Have a good evening Li Vince J CT PM To Li NRON cc Vince J CT Subject Re Hi LiXiao I shall be glad to help and give you a good recommendation Please give my name as a recommender to the AA Pool Vince Li NRON PM To Vince J CT cc Subject Hi Hi Vince How are you Just last week I got admission from U of Chicago MBA program so did Yvan by the way Now I am applying loan from Enron AA pool The person who is in charge of this told me that it needs three recommendations from current boss and previous boss for the application and that the requirement includes all PRC rankings in either excellent or superior that I didnt achieve in the first rotation in Research Getting loan is cricial at the stage I wonder if you can be one of my recommenders This will be a big help Thank you Li x
